Name: HBRetail_D2C_RetailCA
Expression: {TM1SORT({UNION(     {TM1FILTERBYLEVEL( {TM1DRILLDOWNMEMBER( {TM1FILTERBYPATTERN( {TM1SUBSETALL( [Locations] )}, "HBH California LLC")}, ALL, RECURSIVE )}, 0)},     {UNION(          {TM1FILTERBYLEVEL( {TM1DRILLDOWNMEMBER( {TM1FILTERBYPATTERN( {TM1SUBSETALL( [Locations] )}, "HB RETAIL")}, ALL, RECURSIVE )}, 0)},          {TM1FILTERBYLEVEL( {TM1DRILLDOWNMEMBER( {TM1FILTERBYPATTERN( {TM1SUBSETALL( [Locations] )}, "HB DIR-TO-CONSUMER")}, ALL, RECURSIVE )}, 0)}     )})}, ASC )}
